title: PLUS+
slogan: Boost your teams' performance and productivity with tailor-made Excel and PowerPoint add-ins.
description: PLUS+ is a tailor-made software solution that boosts team performance and productivity through customized add-ins for Excel and PowerPoint. Integrating the latest advances in artificial intelligence and OCR, PLUS+ enables fast and accurate data extraction, as well as automated digital recognition.

extraction.title: Automated Extraction and Classification
extraction.description: Advanced data extraction, automatic classification of balance sheets and income statements for simplified management.

analysis.title: Periodic Analysis
analysis.description: Generation of detailed monthly reports for regular and reliable monitoring.

customization.title: Total Customization
customization.description: Adaptation of digital formats (tables, cells, columns, graphs, etc.) and interfaces (PowerPoint export, automatic refresh) according to specific client needs.

licensing.title: Flexible Licenses
